page.title: 18RUSHBURY SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content:
Each day begins with the two classes meeting together for an{Assembly.}On Wednesdays the Rector comes into school for this.
Children work individually from a {Mathematics}and an English scheme,although class work is done in these subjects as well. {Topic}work includes{History,Geography, {Science }and{Craft. Sometimes both classes work at different levels at a topic of common interest. Visits to places of interest are arranged to fit in with Topic work.{ { Physical Activities}include{Football, {Netball, Rounders, Swimming}and{ {Athletics. { { }
